N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

max_diff = 0
min_a = A[0]  # 最小値
for i in range(1, N):
    max_diff = max(max_diff, A[i]-min_a)  # 最大差分を更新
    min_a = min(min_a, A[i])  # 最小値を更新
print(max_diff)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    array = list(map(int, input().split()))
    max_diff = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            diff = abs(array[i] - array[j])
            if diff > max_diff:
                max_diff = diff
    print(max_diff)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    array = list(map(int, input().split()))
    max_diff = -1
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            diff = abs(array[i] - array[j])
            if diff > max_diff:
                max_diff = diff
    print(max_diff)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
